Name: Daiquiri Noir
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise).
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with a mint leaf or float the tip of a mint sprig.
Review: Honey herbal whiskey liqueur adds complexity to this minty, fresh, aged rum Daiquiri.
History: Discovered in 2008 at Hugos Bar Pizza in Sydney, Australia.
